tag_list: health, drinks, beverages, games, gamedev, flash-games
overview:
Vitaliy Kolesnikov is an indie game developer. He made flash games and mobile games for Android.

His popular games are “Cheepers”, “Mindy in Zombieland”, “Lucky Box” and other. More games you can find on his website http://drderico.com.

Vitaliy also has a blog about healthy beverages because he leads a healthy lifestyle.
